message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you first. I think you'll get a lot of value out of it. How about $118?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I can't go quite that low.  How about we meet in the middle at $114?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. How about $112?
